name: Self-Killer
description:
Welcome to Self-Killer!

CONTROLS:

Use WASD or arrow keys to move, touch an object with player to interact.

GOAL:

The goal of the game is to kill yourself. There are two ways that can be accomplished, and you must find out how.

STORY:

During your birth, the last of the sacred oracles of the Greek god Apollo issued its last prophecy about the next birthed child. It said that they would never age from manhood, never die.  After reaching the age of 30, you found about this seemingly wonderful prophecy. But at the age of 543, you are tired of living and watching the people you love come and go. Although there is no cheating fate, you are determined to kill yourself one way or another.
